name: AX2012Build
description: Executes AX Build tool on an AX 2012 environment
author: SDK4NET.de

inputs.name: configurationFileName
inputs.label: Server config file path (.axc)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The file path of the server configuration file.

inputs.name: clientConfigurationFileName
inputs.label: Client config file path (.axc)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The file path of the client configuration file to set altbin parameter. (optional)

inputs.name: workers
inputs.label: Number of AOS workers
inputs.helpMarkDown: Number of parallel or concurrent AOS workers for the compilation and build processes. (optional)

inputs.name: logPath
inputs.label: Log file path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path to save the log files to.

inputs.name: symbolsMaximumWaitTime
inputs.label: Max wait time (min)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The number of minutes to wait before failing the step. (optional)
